title: Scary for Android Wear
summary: If you like to laugh and make jokes you'll love this Android Wear application
description: Scary "Halloween Edition" for Android WearIf you like to laugh and make jokes you'll love this application.Hide your phone or tablet and wait quietly. Then from your watch trigger a series of scary sounds.You can choose among sounds of ghosts, chains, screams, animal noises ...At any time you can adjust the volume with swipe up / down.Enjoy!Note you need to have an Android Wear watch to be able to use this app
descriptionHTML:
Scary "Halloween Edition" for Android Wear
If you like to laugh and make jokes you'll love this application.
Hide your phone or tablet and wait quietly. Then from your watch trigger a series of scary sounds.
You can choose among sounds of ghosts, chains, screams, animal noises ...
At any time you can adjust the volume with swipe up / down.
Enjoy!

Note you need to have an Android Wear watch to be able to use this app
comments: A lot of fun. No one is safe.
Eh, I have to keep my screen on in order for this to work...so what's the point.
